benchmark_details.name: FlashAdventure
benchmark_details.overview: FlashAdventure is a benchmark of 34 diverse Flash-based adventure games designed to evaluate GUI agentsâ€™ ability to complete full story arcs.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To evaluate GUI agents solving full story arcs in diverse adventure games.

data.source: 34 Flash-based adventure games from the FlashPoint Archive.
data.annotation: Game state is automatically evaluated via the CUA-as-a-Judge framework.

methodology.calculation: Success is evaluated based on whether the final narrative goal is achieved.
methodology.interpretation: A higher percentage indicates better performance in completing story arcs.

ethical_and_legal_considerations.data_licensing: Games used for non-commercial, academic research purposes only, permissions obtained from rights holders.
ethical_and_legal_considerations.consent_procedures: Detailed consent process for human gameplay demonstrations.
